diff_hunk:
@@ -2500,6 +2500,88 @@ def mixtypes():
                 if True:
                     a = 4
 
+    def test_onnx_export_script_module(self):
+        class ModuleToExport(torch.jit.ScriptModule):
+            def __init__(self):
+                super(ModuleToExport, self).__init__()
+
+            @torch.jit.script_method
+            def forward(self, x):
+                y = x - x
+                return x + x
+
+        mte = ModuleToExport()
+        f = io.BytesIO()
+        torch.onnx._export(mte, (torch.zeros(1, 2, 3),), f, verbose=False)
+
+    def test_onnx_export_script_python_fail(self):
+        class ModuleToInline(torch.jit.ScriptModule):
+            def __init__(self):
+                super(ModuleToInline, self).__init__()
+
+            def forward(self, x):
+                return torch.neg(x)
+
+        class ModuleToExport(torch.jit.ScriptModule):
+            def __init__(self):
+                super(ModuleToExport, self).__init__()
+                self.mod = ModuleToInline()
+
+            @torch.jit.script_method
+            def forward(self, x):
+                y = self.mod(x)
+                return y + y
+
+        mte = ModuleToExport()
+        f = io.BytesIO()
+        with self.assertRaisesRegex(RuntimeError, "Couldn't export Python operator"):
body: A call to a module that's not traced or scripted shows up as a PythonOp call to the forward method
body_html: A call to a module that's not traced or scripted shows up as a PythonOp call to the forward method
